feed.title: AppFlowy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.6
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.6 - 07/30/2024

New Features

  • Upgrade your workspace to unlock unlimited storage, more members, and unlimited AI responses.
  • Introduce a new block: Image gallery.
  • Support drag and drop images into documents.

Bug Fixes

  • Fix minor UI issues on Desktop and Mobile.

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.7
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.7 - 08/13/2024

New Features

  • Store files anywhere within your documents
  • Introduce AI Chat: ask questions and generate summaries from your documents
  • Select your preferred model from GPT-4o, Claude 3 Sonnet, and more to power AppFlowy AI
  • Enable comments on published pages

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed an issue with pasting text into a list item
  • Fixed a focus loss issue in documents that include multiple databases

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.7.1
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.7.1 - 14/08/2024

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed the issue where workspace id was not compatible with settings page.

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.7.2
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.7.2 - 20/08/2024

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed file upload issue.
  • Fixed missing slash menu items: todolist and divider.

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.8
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.8 - 02/09/2024

New Features

  • Optimized date picker and mention block.
  • Added the ability to open database row on mobile.
  • Added the ability to invite members to workspace on mobile.
  • Added support for Monochrome theme on Android.
  • Added AI Bubble button on homepage on mobile.
  • Settings, trash, members and help & support have been moved into the settings pop up menu.

Bug Fixes

  • Removed Wayland header from AppImage build
  • Fixed the issue where pasting web image on mobile failed.
